name: Tegos
tagline: Knowledge of the Industry is the Key to Success.
description:
Since its founding in 1996, the tegos GmbH Dortmund has become the leading business solution provider for the waste and recycling industry based on Microsoft Dynamics NAV and AX.
Our goal is to help companies from all areas of waste management and recycling business and the metal trade to deliver complete IT solutions through a visible added value that ensures your market position. We believe that knowledge of the industry is the key to success. Only those who have language, understands the market and customer problems, can deliver real solutions.
We provide not only industry-specific enterprise software, but future-proof solutions to all areas of the computer hardware and network technology to document management and business intelligence from a single source.
Our solutions are distributed nationally and internationally by a strong network of partners. Our partners understand the challenges of their markets and guarantee for a software solution that complies with all local regulations and is supervised on-site during the installation and use of the software.
The strategic focus on the waste and recycling industry, we will pursue in the future more than ever and continue to expand. So that we can assure our customers, potential customers and partners to implement all the projects successfully and operate a long-term business relationship with them, to further deepen and broaden.
READ MORE...
